sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavbarToggler, Collapse, NavItem, Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isNavOpen: false, isModalOpen: false } this.toggleModal = this.toggleModal.bind(this); this.handleLogin = this.handleLogin.bind(this); } toggleModal() { this.setState({ isModalOpen: !this.state.isModalOpen }) } handleLogin(event) { this.toggleModal(); alert("Username: " + this.username.value + " Password: " + this.password.value + " Remember: " + this.remember.checked); event.preventDefault(); } render() { const toggleNav = () => { this.setState({ isNavOpen: !this.state.isNavOpen }) } return (
Home About Us Menu Contact Us

Ristorante con Fusion

We take inspiration from the World's best cuisines, and create a unique fusion experience. Our lipsmacking creations will tickle your culinary senses!

Login
this.username = input} /> this.password = input} />
); } } export default Header;
